posts.post_content:
"Timetwister was much too powerful at three mana. But we could balance the card... if we made it *no mana*! Yeah, that's the ticket!"
  
   
Oh, Urza's block.

posts.post_content: I think also besides the officially restricted cards, there is a list of cards that are discouraged in EDH. Essentially it comes down to common sense, EDH games are supposed to be fun and casual, not vulgar displays of infinite graveyard recursion, extra turns, drawing out your whole deck in one go, etc.

posts.post_content: @SlackWareWolf - at the time, there were a lot of other 'free' cards that cost less than this. With today's availability of extra mana lands, this card, and other free cards, supply a surplus of mana. If you were allowed to have four of these in your deck, you could probably cast everything in your deck in a single turn and end your turn with a hand full of land.

posts.post_content:
*"I would like to see the legality of all of the cards in EDH and Highlander as well as block, 1.5 and 1"* -mysticmaple  
  
EDH is allowed anything that is Vintage legal (restrictions are still legal) except the original moxen and the power amongst a smattering of other cards. If you want to know the suggested EDH ban list, just use your search engine of choice to search *EDH ban list*.
posts.html:
"I would like to see the legality of all of the cards in EDH and Highlander as well as block, 1.5 and 1" -mysticmaple

Posted By: psychichobo (11/2/2012 4:50:55 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
Potential card advantage, potential board advantage, graveyard hate, restoring the possibility you'll have access to cards that were in your graveyard, combo piece for infinite mana, ... amazing card.  
  
Also, [Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind) and [Consecrated Sphinx](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Consecrated Sphinx) love this thing. Make sure to have a [Reliquary Tower](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Reliquary Tower) or other card with the clause "you have no maximum hand size" if you're using Time Spiral with Consecrated Sphinx on the battlefield!
posts.html:
Potential card advantage, potential board advantage, graveyard hate, restoring the possibility you'll have access to cards that were in your graveyard, combo piece for infinite mana, ... amazing card.

Also, Niv-Mizzet, the Firemind and Consecrated Sphinx love this thing. Make sure to have a Reliquary Tower or other card with the clause "you have no maximum hand size" if you're using Time Spiral with Consecrated Sphinx on the battlefield!
